site.title: Currency Converter
site.description: Free currency converter with real-time exchange rates for 150+ currencies. Convert USD, KRW, JPY, EUR and more.

converter.title: Currency Converter
converter.subtitle: Real-time exchange rates for 150+ currencies. Updated daily.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: At the current exchange rate, 1 {fromCode} equals approximately {rate} {toCode}. Exchange rates fluctuate daily.
faq.a2: You can convert through banks, currency exchange offices, or online remittance services. Compare exchange fees to find the best rate.
faq.q3: How often does the {fromCode}/{toCode} rate change?
faq.a3: The forex market operates 24 hours on weekdays and rates change in real-time. Rates on this site are updated daily.

faq.a2: You can convert through cryptocurrency exchanges like Upbit, Bithumb, Binance, or Coinbase. Compare trading fees to find the best rate.
faq.q3: How often does the {fromCode}/{toCode} price change?
faq.a3: The cryptocurrency market operates 24/7 and prices change in real-time. Rates on this site are updated daily.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Useful information and guides about exchange rates, currency conversion, and international transfers

rates.title: Exchange Rates
rates.subtitle: Latest exchange rates for 150+ world currencies

footer.source: Exchange rates provided by open source API. Updated daily.

about.title: About
about.p1: CurrencyCalc provides real-time exchange rate information and a convenient currency calculator for over 150 currencies worldwide.
about.p2: Based on daily updated exchange rate data, anyone can quickly and easily check and calculate exchange rates.
about.p3: We provide accurate exchange rate information for free, whether you need it for travel, studying abroad, business, or international transfers.
about.f1: Real-time exchange rate calculator for 150+ currencies
about.f2: Dedicated pages for 50+ popular currency pairs
about.dataDesc: Exchange rate data is sourced from a reliable open-source API and automatically updated daily. The rates provided are for reference purposes only. Please check with your financial institution for actual transaction rates.
about.contactDesc: If you have any questions or suggestions about our service, please reach out through our contact page.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: CurrencyCalc ('the Service') values your privacy and processes personal information as follows.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.desc: The Service does not require registration and does not directly collect personal information. However, information such as IP address, browser type, and pages visited may be automatically collected during your use of the Service.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.desc: The Service may use cookies to improve user experience and analyze service usage. You can refuse cookies through your browser settings, but some features may be limited.

ads.title: Advertising
ads.desc: The Service may display advertisements through Google AdSense. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your interests.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.desc: The Service uses third-party services for exchange rate data, web analytics, and advertising. Please refer to each service's privacy policy for their data handling practices.

security.title: Security
security.desc: The Service transmits data securely through HTTPS encryption and takes reasonable security measures to protect user information.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.desc: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: If you have questions, suggestions, or want to report an error, please reach out through the methods below.
contact.emailDesc: For general inquiries, advertising inquiries, and technical support, please send us an email.
contact.feedbackDesc: If you have ideas or suggestions for improving the service, please don't hesitate to reach out. Your feedback helps us make CurrencyCalc better.
